languages.text: {n}Соломон не отстраняется, его прикосновения бережны и полны затаенной силы.{/n} "Спасибо".
{n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон не отстраняется, его прикосновения бережны и полны затаенной силы.{/n} "Спасибо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

{n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは身を引かなかった。彼の手は優しく、そして内に秘めた強さに満ちていた。{/n}「ありがとうございます」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは身を引かなかった。彼の手は優しく、そして内に秘めた強さに満ちていた。{/n}「ありがとうございます」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne weicht nicht zurück. Seine Berührung ist sanft und voller verborgener Kraft.{/n} "Danke."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne weicht nicht zurück. Seine Berührung ist sanft und voller verborgener Kraft.{/n} "Danke."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ne fait pas mine de s'écarter. Son contact est à la fois tendre et empreint de force contenue.{/n} « Merci. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne ne fait pas mine de s'écarter. Son contact est à la fois tendre et empreint de force contenue.{/n} « Merci. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne no se aparta. Su tacto es cariñoso y denota una gran fuerza contenida.{/n} «Gracias».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne no se aparta. Su tacto es cariñoso y denota una gran fuerza contenida.{/n} «Gracias».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙没有抽身，他温柔地抚摸着你，动作中充满了隐藏的力量感。{/n}“谢谢你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙没有抽身，他温柔地抚摸着你，动作中充满了隐藏的力量感。{/n}“谢谢你。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne geri çekilmiyor. Nazik dokunuşunun ardında gizli bir güç yattığını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Teşekkürler."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne geri çekilmez. Nazik dokunuşunun ardında gizli bir güç yattığını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Teşekkürler."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne does not pull away. His touch is gentle and full of hidden strength.{/n} "Thank you."
